> {: .highlight .text-epsilon }
> Git is a distributed version control system that tracks changes in any set of computer files.
>
> {: .note-title .text-epsilon }
>> Installation
>>
>> `$ brew install git`
>
> {: .note-title .text-epsilon }
>> Validation
>>
>> `$ git --version`
